question_text: A user complains that their system boots inconsistently and freezes randomly. Other components test fine. Whatâ€™s the most likely root cause?
answer_options: Failing motherboard traces or VRM instability
correct_answer: Failing motherboard traces or VRM instability
explanation: Inconsistent boot behavior with no pattern, especially when all other components pass diagnostics, often points to a damaged or unstable motherboard.
